short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display bookmark directories on new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension to show your bookmarks on new tab. Bookmarks are organised in groups, where each group represents one directory from bookmark manager. 

To add new group, press "+" button and select directory from bookmark manager.

To add new bookmark, simply save bookmark as you are used to. 

Bookmarks on the new tab are always synchronised with bookmark manager. Both, groups and bookmarks could be reorganised by drag and drop.

To restore default new tab page, remove this extension.
